Name: Fortinet FortiGate
Author: Eli Forbes - v-eliforbes@microsoft.com
Description: [FortiGate Next-generation Firewalls](https://www.fortinet.com/products/next-generation-firewall) are powered by purpose-built security processing units (SPUs), including the latest NP7 (Network Processor 7). They enable security-driven networking, and are ideal network firewalls for hybrid and hyperscale data centers
